name: SickCircle
description:
This is a small project done for the GameCodeur school french gamejam about "contamination". I challenged myself to do a game in less than 5 hours before the closing of submission entries with no graphics. It took me 2 and half hours to do it using GameMaker Studio 2.

You can download the source code if you want to take a look or improve the project. Either way, I don't care. Do what you want with it.

You are a circle and you have been infected. Now you must infect other circles to keep extending your lifespan. Infection will in turn spread from infected circles to sane ones but beware ! You won't get extended time for those indirect infections.
How many circles will you infect before meeting your end?

Controls : Mouse.
